name: Everywhere Road Trip
description:
"More than a race, this is a racing adventure!"

The World of Roadtrip Adventure will take you on a journey through many different locations...

-Customize your ride with over 250 parts, 100 races and events. 20 mini-games - Soccer, Roulette & more.

-Go head to head in the superb two-player mode!

-Win races to win cash.

-Collect photos on your "Road Trip Adventure", travel town to town, and paint ads on your car to earn extra money!

-Featuring the world-famous Penny Racer cars.

Information is taken from the back of the box (EU Version)
